body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer          The National Park Service cares for more than 390 of our nation's most important natural and cultural sites, including Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site.  Become a part of the National Park Service Volunteers-In-Parks (VIP) today. See below or email us for more information about local volunteer opportunities or click here to go to the official volunteer website for all agencies.       Current Volunteer Opportunities
title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Volunteer
